Name: MUSU
Description: Kamigotchi kurrency

Name: Gacha Ticket
Description: Redeemable for one Kami. You should take this to the vending machine…

Name: Kamigotchi World Passport
Description: Your path to salvation during playtest. Your ticket to great fortunes.

Name: Reroll Ticket
Description: Allows you to reroll a Kami once. You should take this to the vending machine…

Name: ONYX
Description: Asphodel’s premium game currency. You want this. You want this so bad.

Name: Wooden Stick
Description: Wood in its unprocessed form. Grows on trees.

Name: Stone
Description: It’s just a stone. Can be used to get Stone.

Name: Plastic Bottle
Description: Can be reprocessed into valuable raw Microplastics.

Name: Pine Cone
Description:
It’s a pine cone. 

Slightly sacred.

Name: Scrap Metal
Description: A small chunk of scrap metal. Maybe useful if processed.

Name: Glass Jar
Description: A somehow-unbroken jar of clear glass.

Name: Pine Pollen
Description: Some people think this is very good for you.

Name: Red Amber Crystal
Description: A crystal of pure red amber, formed deep in the forest.

Name: Black Poppy
Description: You can’t tell whether it’s a very dark purple or actually black. A rare flower.

Name: Daffodil
Description: A reflection of fallen Narcissus… Has its own uses and applications.

Name: Mint
Description: A herb with many applications. Not often found here….

Name: Candle
Description: A half-melted candle, somehow still burning. Perhaps this has some special use.…

Name: Screwdriver
Description: For driving screws. May be of practical use….

Name: Red Gakki Ribbon
Description:
Capable of raising a Kamigotchi from the dead. 

These ribbons are greatly prized….

Name: Holy Dust
Description: This sacred dust can be used to rename Kamigotchi… At the proper place.

Name: Gaokerena Mochi
Description: A glossy purple mochi. It's filled with a green and fibrous root paste confection made with milk. Permanently adds +10 to a Kamigotchi’s Health.

Name: Sunset Apple Mochi
Description: A deep red and orange mochi. It's filled with a golden apple jam that has a warm, heavenly flavor. Permanently adds +1 to a Kamigotchi’s Power.

Name: Kami Mochi
Description: A deep blue mochi with a butterfly stamp. It's filled with soft, white curds that resemble a fresh cheese. Permanently adds +1 to a Kamigotchi’s Violence.

Name: Mana Mochi
Description: A sky blue mochi. It's filled with small white grains that burst with a honey-sweet flavor. Permanently adds +1 to a Kamigotchi’s Harmony.

Name: XP Candy (Small)
Description: Feed this to a Kamigotchi to give them a little bit of experience.

Name: XP Candy (Medium)
Description: Provides a decent amount of XP when fed to a Kami.

Name: XP Candy (Large)
Description: This gives a lot of XP when fed to a Kamigotchi.

Name: XP Candy (Huge)
Description: This is far larger than any XP Candy you’ve seen before. Gives a huge amount of XP when fed to a Kamigotchi.

Name: Maple-Flavor Ghost Gum
Description: The most basic form of food available in this world - restores 25 Health to a Kamigotchi.

Name: Cheeseburger
Description: These burgers, still in their original wrapping, are occasionally found in the scrapyard. Apparently Kamigotchi love them.

Name: Pom-Pom Fruit Candy
Description: These fruit candies contain a huge amount of energy. Restores 50 Health to a Kamigotchi.

Name: Gakki Cookie Sticks
Description: Heavy duty rations by a Kami’s standards.. Restores 100 Health to a Kamigotchi.

Name: Gingerbread Cookie
Description: A gingerbread cookie... feed this to a Kamigotchi for some extra experience.

Name: Resin
Description: Sticky, with a refreshing taste. Could be used to make Amber or in other forms of crafting…

Name: XP Potion
Description: Give to a Kami to increase their XP by 1000.

Name: Greater XP Potion
Description: Give to a Kami to increase their XP by 15000.

Name: Respec Potion
Description: Give to a Kami to reset their skill points.

Name: Grace Potion
Description: Give to a Kami to decrease loss of health during the next Harvest by 25%.

Name: Bless Potion
Description: Give to a Kami to increase the MUSU gained from the next Harvest by 25%.

Name: Mistletoe
Description: Sacred, at this time of year..... can be used on Kami to Bless them!

Name: Giftbox
Description: The lowest tier of giftbox. You can get XP candies, cheeseburgers, and even a few rare item drops from this!

Name: Scroll of Shop Teleportation
Description: Instantly transports the user to Mina’s Shop. Fully insured.

Name: Ice Cream
Description: Restorative ice-cream. Food for you, personally. Restores a little bit of your stamina.

Name: Better Ice Cream
Description: A slightly larger and higher-quality ice-cream. What is this made of? Restores a medium amount of stamina.

Name: Best Ice Cream
Description: A huge, lavishly decorated ice-cream. It doesn’t seem to be melting at all… Restores a lot of stamina.

Name: Ring of Water Breathing
Description: Allows the bearer to travel underwater.

Name: Spice Grinder
Description: Can be used to break down ingredients.

Name: Portable Burner
Description: Can be used to make Potions at a riverside.

Name: Astrolabe Disk
Description:
Some sort of golden disk. Purpose: completely unknown. 

You feel like you should hold on to it.

Name: ETH
Description: Ether

Name: TIA
Description: Celestia

Name: INIT
Description: Initia
